hero.subtitle: Developing technology solutions
hero.description: Information Systems Engineer with experience in full stack development, automation, and data analysis. I work with technologies like Python, .NET, Power BI, and RPA in agile environments to deliver scalable and efficient solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: My work focuses on addressing real needs through the strategic use of modern tools. I contribute to backend development, data visualization, and automation projects, emphasizing clarity, efficiency, and collaboration.
about.work_2: Automating tasks using RPA and cloud scripts.
about.work_3: Data visualization and reporting with Power BI.
about.learn_2: Scientific computing with Python and SciPy.
about.footer: Focused on continuous learning, collaboration, and the strategic application of technology.

skills.title: Skills

skills.footer: Experience combining modern tools with best practices to deliver effective and scalable solutions.
